prop_obj.text: The Marketing syllabus at the Senior Secondary School level in Nigeria is designed to assess the candidates’
basic knowledge of marketing. It includes an overview of marketing, marketing concepts, marketing mix,
consumer and organizational behaviour, marketing management and entrepreneurship.

The aim of the examination is to test candidates’
(1).       knowledge, skills, concepts needed to practice marketing as a career.
(2).      ability to set up and manage a market outlet.
(3).      understanding of the roles of marketing in the economy

There will be two papers, Papers 1 and 2, both of which will constitute a composite paper to be taken at one sitting.
will consist of forty multiple-choice objective questions which will cover the entire syllabus.
Candidates are expected to answer all the questions in 50 minutes for 40 marks.
will be a 2-hour paper consisting of six essay questions, out of which
candidates will be expected to answer any four for 80 marks.

consumer and organizational behaviour, marketing management and entrepreneurship.
